item.title: 5 Errors, don't know what to fix -.-
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Replace that piece of code with:

} else if (playerRights == 3 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Co-Owner")) { yell("[CO-OWNER] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } else if (playerRights == 3 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Out 2 Get Me")) { yell("[OWNER] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } }

Read full topic

item.title: 5 Errors, don't know what to fix -.-
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

Here is what shows,

client.java:7844: illegal start of expression }else if(playerRights==3) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Co-Owner")) { ^ client.java:7844: ';' expected }else if(playerRights==3) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Co-Owner")) { ^ client.java:7846: 'else' without 'if' }else if(playerRights==3) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Out 2 Get Me")) { ^ client.java:7846: illegal start of expression }else if(playerRights==3) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Out 2 Get Me")) { ^ client.java:7846: ';' expected }else if(playerRights==3) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Out 2 Get Me")) { ^ 5 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Here is what I was trying to edit,

}else if(playerRights==3) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Co-Owner")) { yell("[CO-OWNER] "+playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }else if(playerRights==3) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Out 2 Get Me")) { yell("[OWNER] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } }

Read full topic
